EmailTemplate.subject: Want to Improve Efficiency & Safety When You Fly?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Improve efficiency and safety when you upgrade your aircraft with U.S. Domestic FANS and PM-CPDLC from Honeywell with StandardAero.
PM-CPDLC (or Protected mode Controller Pilot Data Link Communication) is a key enabler of FAA NextGen Initiatives aimed at handling more traffic, reducing flight delays, routing aircraft more efficiently, and improving safety, all while reducing operational costs for airspace users. With PM-CPDLC, pilots experience:
- Increased speed of information dissemination, both to and from the aircraft - Improved information delivery speed to help eliminate delays - Reduced communication problems between air traffic controller and pilot - Easy updates of route clearances into the aircraft’s flight plan - Automation of routine pilot tasks such as clearances, microphone checks, and ATC handoffs
Want to learn more? Click below to contact StandardAero for more information on the PM-CPDLC offering or to request a quote for your aircraft.
